        Validates User's name

      • validateEmail

        public java.lang.String validateEmail(java.lang.String email,
                                      org.sql2o.Sql2o sql2o)
                               throws InvalidDataException,
                                      DuplicateRecordException
        Validates User's email (Note, emails must be unique)
        Parameters:
        email - email of the user
        sql2o - database object
        Returns:
        email of user
        Throws:
        InvalidDataException - thrown if email fails to validate
        DuplicateRecordException - thrown if email is already in the database

        Throws:

      • validatePwd

        public java.lang.String validatePwd(java.lang.String pwd)
                             throws InvalidDataException
        Validates User's password hash
        Parameters:
        pwd - the user's password hash
        Returns:
        pwd hash of user
        Throws:

      • validate

        public abstract void validate()
                       throws org.sql2o.Sql2oException,
                              NoRecordFoundException,
                              InvalidDataException,
                              NoJsonToParseException,
                              DuplicateRecordException
        Confirms user data is valid
        Specified by:
        validate in class DatabaseObjectMapper
        Throws:
        org.sql2o.Sql2oException - thrown if database error occurs
        NoRecordFoundException - thrown if json data is inconsistent with that in database
        InvalidDataException - thrown if json data can not be read
        NoJsonToParseException - thrown if called without proper json data
        DuplicateRecordException - thrown if email is already in the database
